content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals log subscript 2 x"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following is equivalent to <math alttext="f open parentheses 7 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>7</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="log subscript 10 open parentheses 7 over 2 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>10</mn></msub><mfenced><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator log subscript 10 2 over denominator log subscript 10 7 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>10</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>10</mn></msub><mn>7</mn></mrow></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator log subscript 7 10 over denominator log subscript 2 10 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>7</mn></msub><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator log subscript 3 7 over denominator log subscript 3 2 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mn>7</mn></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator log subscript 3 7 over denominator log subscript 3 2 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mn>7</mn></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
